price: Sunã jãyayya da kai a cikin (sha'anin) gaskiya a bãyan tã bayYanã, kamar dai lalle anã kõra su zuwa ga mutuwa ne alhãli kuwa sunã kallo.
arabic: يُجَٰدِلُونَكَ فِي ٱلۡحَقِّ بَعۡدَ مَا تَبَيَّنَ كَأَنَّمَا يُسَاقُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَوۡتِ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yujādilūnaka fī al-ḥaqi baʿdamā tabayyana ka-annamā yusāqūna ilā al-mawti wahum yanẓurūna
